Prebon laughed.

"Yes, it is pretty good, isn't it?" he said, kissing Spears on the 
cheek, " Alright. Blaze stand by Striker's door. Bullet, watch the 
camera. Everyone else, let's move out!" Prebon put his arm around 
Spears and guided her out of the base. Hammer and Ignatius followed.

______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

When they had done unloading everything, Brix turned to Ratchet and 
the rest.

"Alrigt, let's go implement our new system."

"But Brix, that could take awhile. Who knows what they are doing to 
Spears and Striker?"

"I guess you're right Fliq. We've got to do something, and fast! We 
should get some re-inforcements from the Cybertronian Fire and launch 
a counter-attack!"

______________________________________________________________________

Starscream got out of his seat.

"Thank You Lord Zardus. And I hope that you will not take my words 
lightly."

Starscream walked down a hallway and found a map on the wall, and 
followed it to the CR room. When he entered the CR Chamber, he began 
to think about his friends.

"I hope you're all okay. And that scourge Megatron hasn't done 
anything too you. Dollen, Goldeneye, Drillbit, Buldgeon, Phobia, 
KitKat! You all have to be alright. You have to be!"
